Name: CRATES N' MOHAWKS
About the game: An arcade experience with a focus on chasing that high score! Fast-paced action - straight to the point Short and sweet gameplay - each round is approx. 5 minutes 9 guns from crates to constantly switch between and challenge yourself 7 colorful and unique enemies to give the middle finger Waves increasing in challenge 'til death or glory
